items.title: E-Commerce Fashion Store
items.prompt: Transform modern e-commerce fashion website into Studio Ghibli illustration style with soft pastel colors, hand-drawn aesthetic, whimsical characters shopping in a magical marketplace

items.title: Tech Startup Landing
items.prompt: Convert tech startup landing page to LEGO brick construction style with bright primary colors, blocky interface elements, playful 3D appearance

items.title: Restaurant Menu Page
items.prompt: Reimagine restaurant menu page as claymation style with textured surfaces, stop-motion aesthetic, warm lighting, handcrafted feel

items.title: Corporate Dashboard
items.prompt: Simplify corporate dashboard to clean vector art logo style with flat colors, bold geometric shapes, minimalist icons

items.title: Educational Platform
items.prompt: Transform educational platform into whimsical storybook illustration with soft pastel palette, playful shapes, hand-drawn elements

items.title: News Portal Homepage
items.prompt: Reinterpret news portal as traditional sumi-e ink wash style with stark black and white contrasts, balanced composition, minimalist brush strokes

items.title: SaaS Product Page
items.prompt: Convert SaaS product page to Studio Ghibli style with nature elements, soft lighting, magical interface components

items.title: Real Estate Listing
items.prompt: Transform real estate listing into LEGO world with brick-built houses, colorful neighborhoods, playful property details

items.title: Healthcare Portal
items.prompt: Reimagine healthcare portal with whimsical illustrations, friendly characters, soft colors to reduce anxiety
